00017 namespace GeographicLib {
00018 
00019   using namespace std;
00020 
00021   const Math::real Gnomonic::eps0 = numeric_limits<real>::epsilon();
00022   const Math::real Gnomonic::eps = real(0.01) * sqrt(eps0);
00023 
00024   void Gnomonic::Forward(real lat0, real lon0, real lat, real lon,
00025                          real& x, real& y, real& azi, real& rk)
00026     const throw() {
00027     real azi0, m, M, t;
00028     _earth.GenInverse(lat0, lon0, lat, lon,
00029                       Geodesic::AZIMUTH | Geodesic::REDUCEDLENGTH |
00030                       Geodesic::GEODESICSCALE,
00031                       t, azi0, azi, m, M, t, t);
00032     rk = M;
00033     if (M <= 0)
00034       x = y = Math::NaN();
00035     else {
00036       real rho = m/M;
00037       azi0 *= Math::degree();
00038       x = rho * sin(azi0);
00039       y = rho * cos(azi0);
00040     }
00041   }
00042 
00043   void Gnomonic::Reverse(real lat0, real lon0, real x, real y,
00044                          real& lat, real& lon, real& azi, real& rk)
00045     const throw() {
00046     real
00047       azi0 = atan2(x, y) / Math::degree(),
00048       rho = Math::hypot(x, y),
00049       s = _a * atan(rho/_a);
00050     bool little = rho <= _a;
00051     if (!little)
00052       rho = 1/rho;
00053     GeodesicLine line(_earth.Line(lat0, lon0, azi0,
00054                                   Geodesic::LATITUDE | Geodesic::LONGITUDE |
00055                                   Geodesic::AZIMUTH | Geodesic::DISTANCE_IN |
00056                                   Geodesic::REDUCEDLENGTH |
00057                                   Geodesic::GEODESICSCALE));
00058     int count = numit, trip = 0;
00059     real lat1, lon1, azi1, M;
00060     while (count--) {
00061       real m, t;
00062       line.Position(s, lat1, lon1, azi1, m, M, t);
00063       if (trip)
00064         break;
00065       // If little, solve rho(s) = rho with drho(s)/ds = 1/M^2
00066       // else solve 1/rho(s) = 1/rho with d(1/rho(s))/ds = -1/m^2
00067       real ds = little ? (m/M - rho) * M * M : (rho - M/m) * m * m;
00068       s -= ds;
00069       if (abs(ds) < eps * _a)
00070         ++trip;
00071     }
00072     if (trip) {
00073       lat = lat1; lon = lon1; azi = azi1; rk = M;
00074     } else
00075       lat = lon = azi = rk = Math::NaN();
00076     return;
00077   }
00078 } // namespace GeographicLib
